title: Ranked borders in 2019
body: If you have honor level 0, you wont get the rewards, this includes the gold border?

replies.body: Wot whait if you have honour level 1 will you get your gold border still?
Neither Honour 1 nor Honour 0 get Season Rewards, and no one gets a Season 8 Border since they're scrapping the End of Season Borders and replacing them with "live" borders.

It's still there, just in some different places. It's moved away from loading screen (which makes sense, it's not exactly an accurate representation of *current* skill) and is moving to places like profile and lobby.

fun side note, if you don't care for the icon or the victorious orianna skin, it doesn't really matter, since next season ranked Borders will be based off your current rank, not your rank in season 8.
